divs: Sighting DetailsTHIS WILL BE MY 3RD POST TO THIS SITE IN THE LAST 4-5 WEEKS. I WAS ABLE TO CAPTURE THIS VIDEO & IMAGE, FROM MY BACKYARD, USING MY DIGITAL CAMERA. WHEN I FIRST TOOK THE VIDEO, I THOUGHT I WAS ONLY CAPTURING THE BLINKING ITEM IN THE CENTER OF THE SHOT. WHEN THE CLIP IS WATCHED CLOSELY, THERE IS MUCH MORE TO IT. 1 - WATCH THE 3-4 ORBS ENTER THE SCREEN FROM THE LEFT. THIS HAPPENS IN THE FIRST FEW SECONDS OF THE VIDEO. WATCH CLOSE BECAUSE THEY FLY VERY FAST. THE ORBS SEEM TO TRAVEL BEHIND THE CLOUD AND EXIT THE RIGHT OF THE SCREEN. THE ORBS ARE CHANGING DIRECTIONS. 2 ��� THE ORIGINAL OBJECT SLOWLY DESCENDS DOWN FROM THE CLOUD. AGAIN, WATCH CLOSE WHILE THE OBJECT MAKES A FULL CIRCLE TOWARDS THE CAMERA AND THEN BACK TO ITS LOCATION. I WILL ALSO ATTACH A PHOTO THAT WAS TAKEN SHORTLY AFTER THE VIDEO. THE ORBS TYPICALLY APPEAR PERFECTLY ROUND. OUT OF 30 IMAGES I WAS ABLE TO TAKE YESTERDAY, ONLY ONE REALLY TAKES ON A LIFE OF ITS OWN. I HAVE NOT MADE UP MY MIND OF WHAT THESE THINGS ARE. AFTER I SAW THIS PICTURE, I AM ALMOST POSITIVE THEY ARE TRYING TO SAY SOMETHING. IF ANYONE HAS ANY FEEDBACK PLEASE EMAIL ME AT HSIBILLY@HOTMAIL.COM. I AM VERY INTERESTED IN WHAT ANYONE HAS TO SAY.
Summary: ANOTHER ORB SIGHTING OVER NORTH PHOENIX (VIDEO)
